name: 楊元森
objective: 這門課程的目的在於訓練學生對於資訊系統之規劃與開發的能力與實作經驗，以解決土木或研究相關問題的能力。課程內容包括C/C++、Java、FORTRAN、MATLAB等不同語言環境之子程式開發與跨語言整合，Windows與Linux分散式運算伺服器基礎環境建立，行動裝置應用程式開發，實驗儀器控制程式化，與資訊系統英文技術文件與使用文件撰寫。上述課程內容均以土木工程實際案例作為教材案例。
schedule:
1.　　Introduction to engineering analysis system
2.　　Off
3.　　Brief of object-oriented programming in C++: Encapsulation
4.　　Brief of object-oriented programming in C++: Inheritance
5.　　Brief of object-oriented programming in C++: Polymorphism 
6.　　Brief of the OpenSees
7.　　Off
8.　　Brief of linear/nonlinear dynamic analysis
9.　　Basic Domain Framework: Adding new Materials and Elements
10.　　Basic Analysis Framework: Adding a new Time Integrator
11.　　Brief of object-oriented programming in Java: Encapsulation
12.　　Brief of object-oriented programming in Java: Inheritance and Polymorphism
13.　　Brief of the FEWS
14.　　FEWS data imports and exports
15.　　Brief of General Adapters
16.　　Advanced programming functions in FEWS
17.　　Final project presentations (1)
18.　　Final project presentations (2)
materials: E Gamma, R Helm, R Johnson, J Vlissides (1995) Design Patterns, Addison Wesley, USA.
